title: "Boris Karloff in The Man With Nine Lives" 1940s movie title Art Deco geometric sans
content:
Hey typo-geniuses,

Can anyone id this main title?

TIA!

Rich

author: rscurry

comments.content: You might find something similar by browsing Nick's Fonts on MyFonts. But this was hand lettered.
Yeah hand lettered for sure. Good thought on the Nick's font though. I usually try and avoid that kind of low level stuff like the plague but in when you need it you need it... haha.
